content: Hi! This is a great question! This sounds like someone who is undecided  and those are really the people we need to connect with! I think it is important to note that while the VP doesn't sign laws like the POTUS, their job is just as important. If this voter likes what Biden has done, then I was would say "The VP, by rules in the consitution, cannot sign laws like the President. But as Vice President, Harris has made history and supported the laws that Biden put in place. If she were to be president, these things would continue under her administration!"

No, they aren't a lost cause. What about meeting over 100 world leaders from across the world to improve our reputation abroad? Passing tie-breaking after tie-breaking vote to deliver the Inflation Reduction Act, several judges and federal department members, etc... Most tie-breaking votes cast by a VP in history, if I remember correctly. In March, she was the first President/VP to go to a Planned Parenthood abortion center to better understand the process and how people are treated. She's taken the lead on abortion messaging for the Admin since Dobbs, too, so there's that to consider
I think calling to her track record as CA's AG and her time as a Senator also helps show the type of advocate she is!
Also true! She's put away crooks, felons, r-pists, the worst of the worst. She can, and will, prosecute the case against Trump
Thank you all! These are all good points. Now I know what to say next time we meet.
Thank you for spreading the message!
